text: Cléber Eduardo Arado (October 11, 1972 - January 2, 2021) was a Brazilian football player. ==Death== Arado died of COVID-19 at a hospital in Curitiba, Paraná on January 2, 2021 at the age of 48. ==Club statistics== |- |1997||Kyoto Purple Sanga||J. title: Cléber Arado
